website_summaries.verdict: Despite our issues with the browser and the uninteresting design, the LG Chocolate Touch is a terrific music phone for Verizon Wireless.
pros: The LG Chocolate Touch has a great music player, a 3.2-megapixel camera, GPS, EV-DO, a 3.5mm headset jack, and a responsive touch screen
cons: The LG Chocolate Touch has a disappointing browser, and the overall look and feel of the phone is nothing we haven't seen before

customer_reviews.title: more dints and scratches than i expected
customer_reviews.text: When we received the phone you could just barely read the packaging addresses. So I was glad to see it made it to me. The phone was listed as " used condition with scratch and dent ". The picture did not match the phone that was sent to me. The dent was bad enough that a screen protecter could not be applied with out a bubble in its place. Overall the phone works great. If I would have know the dent was so bad on the screen I would not have paid for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: this phone is not like the original verizon phone
customer_reviews.text: this phone is not like the original verizon phone. The send button does not work and neither does the message button. When you hit the message button the phone dial pops up. Be very careful who you order your phone from. This makes my second phone and probably my last one,. The first one was ok but the last one it not worth my money. The battery is also very weak and I had to replace it within the first week of receiving this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my "almost" smart phone!
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy with my LG Chocolate Touch phone. The only problem with using it is that the lowest monthly payment (not in a contract) I could get was $60.00 a month plan through Verizon. That was the only bummer. I am very happy with the phone, as I didn't need a "smart phone."
customer_reviews.author: J. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: With FM radio...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. With the FM radio, I can listen to the game out in the yard and my wife can still get a hold of me if she needs to. Good call quality compared to other "smart" phones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: It does show signs of dents, scratches, etc.. Nothing too bad. It has nice battery time, lasts long. I do recommend this phone, very nice, I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great little touch phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone.Great for anyone who would like a nice slim touch phone and does not want to pay for smartphone data package, Does not have a qwerty keybord if your into texting.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: good phone, does not require a data plan - ...
customer_reviews.text: good phone, does not require a data plan - just have to call and tell verizon you do not want one.
customer_reviews.author: Mama M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone and value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased phone used in good condition. Phone is user friendly. Media functions are great and includes FM radio tuner, EQ and apps to play along with music (drums or piano) 1gb of built-in memory and micro sd expansion slot- touch screen works just fine - bargain for the features - love this phone -
customer_reviews.author: king-suave

customer_reviews.title: No Reception
customer_reviews.text: I Got this phone for my wife, ever since it has been activated I have had maybe 2 full conversations with her on it. All other calls have been dropped for reception issues and I know its not Verizon because my phone never drops calls.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Phone didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The phone did not work. We were able to text but we could not talk on the phone. We wanted the phone to use a phone. Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone overall is very good. Never had a problem with freezing up. The one main thing it lacks is dictionary for unfamiliar words. Its FM radio is great. Music player is fantastic. Sound qaulity is great. Takes some getting used to the texting with touch screen but overall works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dogman

customer_reviews.title: LG Chocolate Touch VX8575 3G CDMA
customer_reviews.text: I really like my phone and appreciate the inquiry. I would definitely recommend this phone and actually already have. Is there a case available for this phone? Sonny Christensen
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Christensen

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return it and get my money back
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that this phone was new. It has been nothing but problems! I feel it is defective as I have had this phone for years and has numerous problems with it. I would like to return it and get my money back. I kept overlooking all the problems that came up with it but can no longer do that. I will be going back to my old phone and will not be using it any longer. I bought a card for it and still can't load music on it. I have put approximately $50 into it for all the little things that have gone wrong with it. Thank you, Karen Spelbring 605-999-6064
customer_reviews.author: karen spelbring

customer_reviews.title: The shape it was in was nothing like it wasin the description
customer_reviews.text: Received my phone and went to Verizon to be turned on and the screen did not work. The shape it was in was nothing like it wasin the description. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ns

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It works great to be used. It has a great battery and takes good pictures too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Like New
customer_reviews.text: Although this phone was listed as used, it is like a new phone. It's condition is excellent. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: maureen mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: the screen went black after just a week of using it, I'm not happy about it and I'm out the money I paid for it.... grrrrr
customer_reviews.author: daz

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Phone is good cosmetic repair overall price great.. No mention the speakers do not work on the item ;(. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Aggravated

customer_reviews.title: Some good some bad
customer_reviews.text: I had this cell for 3 years after getting it when it first came out. it was finally ending its days to use so i decided to get another and purchase it from amazon .... The cell worked fine for a day then It was freezing and won't txt correctly .. I have redid the calibration a hundred times no matter what I do the cell seems to ignore me trying to touch it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: The phone seemed fine
customer_reviews.text: It was working , But it was the Verizon end of it they would not activated it unless I was put on there. $80 per month pay/plan to go??, I was looking for a 30/50 prepaid/card ??
customer_reviews.author: canyonmanterry

customer_reviews.title: Great refurbished phone!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this same model phone for 9 years; the original phone's functions (ringing, able to hear the caller, heating up) stopped working properly. My daughter wanted the same exact phone, because of the durability, and it holds a lot of pictures, data and music.so I ordered this refurbished one. It came in nice packaging, with a charger, and works great! I received the phone within 2 days of ordering it, so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. Love-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Don't buy. Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: These suck. Only reason I'v bought nonstop is because my parents only want to use this old crappy phone but it literally needs to be replaced every 3 months. And the one i received was broken too. It kept turning off and freezing. Luckily my parents moved on to a more recent phone but these shouldn't even be sold anymore unless for parts. They suck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great non-smart phone
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. It has the touch keypad, good camera but without the data/smart phone features she does not want or to pay for. It is a very good compromise for anyone who wants all the good things that come with the newer phones without the smart phone costs. This is just what the doctor...er wife ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Harry B. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Best part is i get my phone back without having ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on Verizon, and even though the item description indicated minor scratches there are none, it's near new. Best part is i get my phone back without having to resign a new contract.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Phone is a great alternative to buying a full price phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is a great alternative to buying a full price phone. Screen can be a little sensitive. Overall, it is a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use...perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We find this phone to be perfect for us...the phone had been discontinued as Verizon is only offering old style flip phones in an effort to drive more folks to a smart phone. We wanted one with more features like a touch screen and a good sized keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Lanbert B. West

customer_reviews.title: happy as hell ~!
customer_reviews.text: this is ecactly what they said, and works great had it a few weeks now and not a problem at alll~!~!~ thank you,, buy from here~! im a happy camper~!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and I am very happy with it . I love LG products. Would definitely buy more .
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is better than my last one. Just love it.!
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This phone works for me
customer_reviews.text: For me, it is small enough to carry in a shirt pocket and light also. YThe battery lasts for days and the screen works well. It isn't for folks that drop there phones a lot because the screen is not as tough as I would like. It is the best phone for me.
customer_reviews.author: JHB TX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped! Brand new, in the box, with charger and all protective stickers intact. I was able to transfer everything except calendar reminders from my old phone to the new one in just a few minutes! I've had it almost 2 months now with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Juniper Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good phone in very good shape for a good price
customer_reviews.author: KTJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes hard to get a response to touch screen buttons when they are pressed
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kelly

customer_reviews.title: this phone was not a good one. no camera no pictures not good sound.
customer_reviews.text: This phone was not in good working condition. The camera did not work. The phone sounded terrible and it would not update my contacts. I sent the phone back and I am hoping that I am not charged a restocking fee. Ia m keeping my old lg.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: Another Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I am ordering my second LG Chocolate...after 3 years of great service I SCREWED it up by allowing the magnetic strip of my bankcard to get too close to screen...I was bummed, so I bought a new phone from Cricket, a samsung of sort---I HATE that damn thing...Too little buttons..it goes out in two months, they say they cant do nothing about it so I ordered a new CHOCOLATE from Amazon and will be happy again...In comparison, my chocolate took better pictures, easier to text on, FM radio was fabulous, never locked up on me, ringer is great...I'll never try ANYTHING else new again....CHOCOLATE for me all the way........
customer_reviews.author: lillypad

customer_reviews.title: This phone is awful
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, it was pretty cool. I liked that it had a QWERTY keyboard and a touchscreen unlike my previous phone. Everything that a phone should do, it does. The problem is it's so hard to use the phone because of the touchscreen. I haven't had any really critical breakdowns or anything, but the touchscreen comes and goes. One minute, it will work just fine, then I lock and unlock it and it presses the button two down from what I'm actually pressing. The music player is pretty good for a basic phone, but it isn't worth it. You'd be better off getting a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Murdock

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this phone. The touch screen is the most unresponsive piece of garbage ever created. Text messaging is an absolute nightmare. It only worked for about the first month I got it. After that, it went downhill. Any other phone must be better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio C. Salvo

customer_reviews.title: You can not activate this cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this cell phone to three different cell phone company and they can not activate it, or connect it to the internet. I can not get my phone to connect to the server. I have no service. Can I return this phone?
customer_reviews.author: Pat Norman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked for about 2 weeks before it started messing up. There is no way possible to try to access anything on this phone because the touch screen is so messed up. I was supposed to receive a lightly used phone, but instead received a phone that already had a puncture on the touch screen. Looked absolutely used, and scratched. Bad phone, lies for used phone do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: myshelly

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a year ago and I found nothing wrong with it I like the style it's cute and it is good quality the touch screen is some times iffy but other than that great phone
customer_reviews.author: password

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got this phone. It didn't even last 2 months. The touch screen stopped working. BIG WASTE OF MONEYYYYY
customer_reviews.author: Kristina B. Mudger

customer_reviews.title: Worst Phone Ever Created
customer_reviews.text: I have had my fair share of good phones and bad phones, as has everyone. But this phone happens to be the worst cell phone ever created. The touch screen constantly fails. I have had it replaced 3 times (and I bought it in February) and it still fails. Everyday I want to throw it at a wall and smash it into little pieces. Or bring it out into a field and go Office Space on it. DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. You will regret every second of it.
customer_reviews.author: Auston

product_meta.title: Verizon LG Chocolate Touch VX8575 No Contract 3G Camera MP3 GPS Cell Phone
product_meta.description: LG Chocolate Touch VX8575 is Verizon's 4th Chocolate phone (after the VX8500, VX8550 and VX8560) and sports a 3-inch touchscreen display with WQVGA resolution and support for262k colors. Its other features include a 3.2-megapixel, 1 GB of dedicated music storage, microSD(HC) slot and GPS.
feature_bullets: Features Digital zoom, White balance, Effects, Self-timer, Panorama, Scenes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
